mapper.select: select * from INSHRelationpersonhis where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
delete from INSHRelationpersonhis where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}

update INSHRelationpersonhis set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},personid = #{personid},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi},nodecode = #{nodecode} where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
